org.apache.activemq.core.replication

Class ReplicatedJournal

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.activemq.core.replication.ReplicatedJournal
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.activemq.core.journal.Journal, org.apache.activemq.core.server.ActiveMQComponent

    public class ReplicatedJournal
extends Object
implements org.apache.activemq.core.journal.Journal
    Used by the JournalStorageManager to replicate journal calls.

    This class wraps a ReplicationManager and the local Journal. Every call will be relayed to both instances.

    Author:
    Clebert Suconic
    See Also:
    JournalStorageManager

    • Nested Class Summary
